import { useState } from "react" import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" import { useField } from '../hooks/index' const CreateNew = (props) => { const navigate = useNavigate() const {reset, ...username} = useField('content') const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() props.addNew({ content, author, info, votes: 0 }) // 7.3: routed anecdotes, step3 navigate('/') props.showNotification(content, 5) } return (
